snippet.title: BIG HELMET HEROES - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Grab your friends and discover the funky universe of Big Helmet Heroes, the hilarious 3D beat’em up adventure launching February 6th, 2025 on PC, Xbox Series, Nintendo Switch, and PS5 🥳 👉 Pre-order now and try the demo on Steam or Xbox : https://bighelmetheroesgame.com
Ready, armed, fight! 🛡️⚔️  Discover a visually wacky adventure on your own, with friends or family!

 ⚔️ What is Big Helmet Heroes?
Throw yourself into an epic 3D beat’em up adventure with adorable knights, full of surprising worlds and situations. Grab your buddy and play in 2 player co-op to save the princess, but this is only the beginning!

Follow us:
🧡 Twitter: https://twitter.com/ExaltedStudio
💜 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/hksncHXXa9

#beatemup
